channel.title: Cant login in my own server
channel.description: i did run my source says it online, the client loads then i need to login. I'm logging in......... ERROR CONNECTION TO SERVER!?

item.title: Cant login in my own server
item.dc:creator: @DivineSouls DivineSouls
item.description:
@DivineSouls wrote:

Just to clarify, your server Ip is set to 0.0.0.0, or the serverip that you are running? 0.0.0.0 will work if you don’t have a pre-made server Ip. If you have a server Ip, make sure it is running when you start up the server. When you go to the source files and you click run, make sure you keep it running, then open up your client run.

Read full topic
item.source: Cant login in my own server
